name: DotNetFrameworkValidator
description: Validates that .NET projects only use approved framework versions
author: Sector7
releaseNotes: Fixed authentication issues when accessing Azure DevOps Extension Data Service.

inputs.name: projectPath
inputs.label: Project path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the .NET project files to validate. Supports wildcards.

inputs.name: overrideWhitelist
inputs.label: Override framework whitelist
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of allowed framework versions (e.g., net6.0,net5.0). Leave empty to use the globally configured whitelist.

inputs.name: failOnInvalidFramework
inputs.label: Fail on invalid framework
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, the build will fail when a project uses a framework not in the whitelist. If false, a warning will be issued but the build will succeed.
